# Write a function that can parallel computes the rmcorr in the b cells data

the input of the data should include three column, (1) Sample ID (2)
expression level of KRAB-ZNFs (3) expression level of TEs. You can also
include other information if you need it.

Below is the original TEKRABber::corrOrthologTE()

Try to write corrOrthologTE_rmcorr() The output should be as the same as
the orignal output, however, you can decide to modified it for better
down-stream alaysis. Please refer to the rmcorr manual:
<https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rmcorr/rmcorr.pdf>
